analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0xa7aa8adef7153647611f17e5896888a1bb2dbeb4.sol:
	Contract KPZToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0xa7aa8adef7153647611f17e5896888a1bb2dbeb4.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xa7aa8adef7153647611f17e5896888a1bb2dbeb4.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_contracts/0xa7aa8adef7153647611f17e5896888a1bb2dbeb4.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0xa7aa8adef7153647611f17e5896888a1bb2dbeb4.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
